snippet: Mountain Rescue-Aspen, Rocky Mountain volunteers who rescue from 50 to 75 backcountry travelers a year, recently underwent a five-year recertification.
abstract: Mountain Rescue-Aspen, volunteer rescue team based in the Rocky Mountains, completes a five-year re-certification exam to maintain its accreditation from the Mountain Rescue Association; rescue teams must demonstrate competence in series of challenges that include dealing with avalanches and loose pieces of rock and searching for back-country travelers.
lead_paragraph: Mountain Rescue-Aspen, Rocky Mountain volunteers who rescue from 50 to 75 backcountry travelers a year, recently underwent a five-year recertification.

headline.seo: In Aspen, Colo., Keeping a Mountain Rescue Team on Its Game
headline.main: Keeping a Mountain Rescue Team on Its Game
headline.print_headline: Keeping a Mountain Rescue Team on Its Game
